snippet: LEAD: A California judge has ruled that a toll-free telephone number set up by manufacturers so consumers can find out about toxic substances in products does not meet the requirements of state law....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: A California judge has ruled that a toll-free telephone number set up by manufacturers so consumers can find out about toxic substances in products does not meet the requirements of state law.

headline.main: California Judge Rules Telephone Notice on Toxic Products Is Inadequate

byline.original: Special to The New York Times
